Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; love letters
_description: Three couplets to Margaret, in a French love-letter

CamGon54.Transcription:
Houe gud day nou mergeretewiþ grete loue y þe
                        greteich y walde we miȝten vs ofte metein halle in
                    chambre and in the stretewiþ outen blame of þe contregod
                    ȝeue þat so miȝte hit be
CamGon54.Note:
In a French love-letter, added upside down to penultimate
                    flyleaf.
